description: Scada Certificate Transfer. This is a payload designed to be sent from a SCADA device to the GNodeFactory after the SCADA has opted into its certificate.

LeftRightDot.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by periods, most significant word (on the left) starting with an alphabet character.

TaAlias.title: TerminalAsset Alias
TaAlias.description: GNodeAlias of the TerminalAsset for which the SCADA certificate is issued. The ScadaCert can be found from this.

SignedProof.title: Signed Proof from the SCADA Actor
SignedProof.description: The Scada GNode has a ScadaAlgoAddr in the GNodeFactory database, and the identity of the SCADA actor can be verified by this.

Axiom1.title: Scada is SignedProof signer
Axiom1.description: Axiom 1: Scada is SignedProof signer. There is a ScadaCert created by the Gnf with this ta_alias, and the txn is the OptIn.
